name: Bubble Bonnie
description:
Bonnie Belle has a big problem: bubbles have descended from the sky all over her farm! Can you help her use her trusty slingshot to pop them all? This was going to be my submission for GameGirl Jam, But now I'm submitting it for Trans Gal Jam 2! I hope you enjoy my first-ever game!

Controls:
Space to Start!
Z to Shoot Chestnuts!
Arrow Keys to Move!
